description:
This market refers to the Valorant match between KRÜ Esports and FURIA Esports in the VCT Americas Kickoff Playoffs, scheduled for January 16 at 5:00PM ET.

If FURIA Esports defeats KRÜ Esports by 4 or more rounds across all Matchs in this match, this market will resolve to "FURIA Esports".

Otherwise, it will resolve to "KRÜ Esports".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "KRÜ Esports" if KRÜ Esports win against FURIA Esports in the named Valorant match in the VCT Americas Kickoff Playoffs, scheduled for January 16 at 5:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "FURIA Esports" if FURIA Esports win against KRÜ Esports in the Valorant match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/valorant/Main_Page.
events.title: Valorant: KRÜ Esports vs FURIA Esports (BO3) - VCT Americas Kickoff Playoffs
